docs.snippet: As Jozy Altidore of the national soccer team prepared for World Cup qualifying matches that begin on Friday, he also talked about fighting racism in the world game....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Jozy Altidore of the national soccer team prepared for World Cup qualifying matches that begin on Friday, he also talked about fighting racism in the world game.
docs.abstract: Jozy Altidore, a striker for the United States soccer team, talks effortlessly about racism, his thoughts and feelings on the subject clearly well honed; he is preparing for the start of World Cup qualifying matches; in interview, Altidore navigates some difficult memories with ease, like the game in January during which thousands of Dutch league fans chanted monkey noises at him.

headline.seo: Jozy Altidore’s Soccer Challenges Include Racism

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
